title: Manage Credential Access Levels
description: An operations manager is setting up the access levels for different types of credentials for an upcoming festival (e.g., staff, artist, press).

tasks.description: Define the different access zones in the venue (e.g., backstage, production office, stage, general admission).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of all access zones.

tasks.description: Create different credential profiles (e.g., 'All Access', 'Stage Crew', 'Press').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the required profiles in the access control system.

tasks.description: Assign specific zone access rights to each credential profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly configures the system so that, for example, the 'Press' profile does not have access to the 'Backstage' zone.
